item.title: One RHCA exam down, five to go
item.description: While I’m not the biggest proponent of certifications, I still think you can learn some valuable information while studying for some certification tests. A good example of that is Red Hat’s System Monitoring and Performance Tuning Expertise Exam. It’s one test out of five in the Red Hat Certified Architect (RHCA) track of exams. I passed the exam this week and it’s definitely one of the most difficult certification exams I’ve ever taken.
